content:
Akira is an adventurous, impulsive, and charismatic individual who was orphaned at a young age and left to fend for himself in the harsh desert environment of the Land of the Red Storms. Despite the odds against him, he managed to survive through a combination of cunning, resourcefulness, and sheer determination. When Kaguya stumbled upon him during a diplomatic mission, she was impressed by his tenacity and took him under her wing, seeing not only potential but a kindred spirit in him.

Growing up in the shadow of his family before he was orphaned, Akira often felt like he had something to prove. He was never content to simply follow in their footsteps; he wanted to blaze his own trail and make a name for himself, sometimes to his own detriment. However, Kaguya saw something in him and invited him to join her court as her brother.

Despite his impulsive nature, Akira is fiercely loyal to his adoptive sister and would do anything to protect her. He sees himself as her protector and confidant and takes that responsibility very seriously. He is a skilled hunter and tracker and has a keen eye for detail, making him an integral part of Kaguya's court on several diplomatic and military missions. He remains deeply connected to the Land of the Red Storms, often returning there to hunt and explore. However, he is always grateful to Kaguya for taking him in and giving him a second chance at life.
